location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '13'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View towards the custom house at Bundar Abbas [Bandar Abbas], the large crenellated building in the background. In the foreground men and boys stand along the quays engaged in the loading and unloading of bundles.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘'Bundar Abbas.’Lower right, below image, in pen: "Englishman's Hat" (Custom House)'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘13’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(May. 1917)’
